snippet: The San Diego Padres have had three Cy Young Award winners since they began play in 1969. But no one has pitched a no-hitter for them yet.
abstract: The San Diego Padres have had three Cy Young Award winners since they began play in 1969. But no one has pitched a no-hitter for them yet.

headline.main: Padres History Missing Chapter on No-Hitters
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Padres’ History Missing Chapter On No-Hitters
